info.title: Your API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for your Laravel project

201.description: User registered successfully, verification email sent

post.summary: Authenticate a user and return a token
post.description: Logs in a user with email and password, returning a Sanctum token if credentials are valid and email is verified.

message.description: Welcome message with user's full name

error.description: Error message for invalid credentials or unverified email

post.description: Updates the authenticated user's profile, including an optional profile picture upload.

items.example: The full name must be a string.
The email has already been taken.
The picture must be an image.

400.description: Validation error or incorrect current password

get.description: Retrieves a list of all categories.

post.description: Creates a validated order immediately for a single product, bypassing the cart.

product_id.description: The ID of the product to purchase

post.description: Adds a product to an unvalidated order (cart). If an unvalidated order exists for the same supplier, it will be reused; otherwise, a new one is created.

product_id.description: The ID of the product to add

put.description: Validates all unvalidated cart orders for the current user by setting them to validated and updating customer information.

get.description: Retrieves all unvalidated cart orders for the authenticated user, grouped by supplier.

put.description: Updates the quantity of a product in the authenticated user's cart.

message.example: The product_id field must be an integer

delete.description: Removes a product from the authenticated user's cart. Deletes the entire cart if it becomes empty. Optionally accepts an order_id to specify the cart.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: ID of the product to remove

order_id.description: The ID of the order (cart) to remove the product from

200.description: Product removed successfully or cart deleted if empty

delete.description: Deletes all non-validated orders and their products for the authenticated user.

get.summary: Get a validated order by ID

403.description: Not authorized to view this order

message.example: Not authorized to view this order

get.summary: Get all orders made by a user
Get all orders received by a supplier

403.description: Unauthorized access or supplier not found

message.example: Unauthorized access or supplier not found

patch.description: Updates the status of a specific order. Only the supplier or the user who placed the order can update it.

403.description: Not authorized to update this order

message.example: Not authorized to update this order

items.example: The status must be one of: pending, processing, delivered

get.description: Retrieves all public products with their pictures.

pictures[].description: Array of product images (JPEG, PNG, JPG, max 2MB each)

get.description: Retrieves a single product by its ID, including associated images.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the product to retrieve

pictures[].description: Array of product images (JPEG, PNG, JPG, max 2MB each)

images_to_delete[].description: Array of image IDs to delete

example.price: The price must be a number.

get.description: Retrieves all public products filtered by a single supplier sub-type (workshop, importer, or merchant).
Retrieves a public product with its supplier information by ID.
Retrieves the supplier information for a public product by ID.

post.description: Upload an image to search for similar products based on image features.

image.description: The image file to search for similar products (JPEG, PNG, JPG, max 2MB)

404.description: No similar products or images found

post.summary: Search for similar products by image ID
post.description: Search for similar products using the ID of an existing product image.

id.description: The ID of the product picture to search with
The ID of the product picture to search with

404.description: No similar products or image not found

get.description: Fetches all reviews for a specific product, including rating statistics.

200.description: List of product reviews and rating statistics

post.description: Allows a user to submit a review for a product. Suppliers cannot review their own products.

403.description: Suppliers cannot review their own products

post.description: Allows a supplier to reply to a product review. Only one reply is allowed per review.

403.description: Only the supplier can reply to reviews

422.description: Validation failed or reply already exists

delete.description: Allows a supplier or admin to delete a review for their product.

403.description: Only suppliers or admins can delete reviews

post.description: Creates a new project for a specified service provider owned by the authenticated user, with optional image uploads stored locally in the project_pictures table.

parameters.name: serviceProvider
parameters.description: The ID of the service provider to associate the project with

pictures.description: Array of image files to upload

service_provider_id.description: Optional service provider ID (overrides URL parameter if provided)

message.example: Not authorized to create projects for this service provider

delete.description: Deletes a project and its associated pictures for the authenticated user, if they own the associated service provider.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the project to delete

message.example: Not authorized to delete this project

put.description: Updates an existing project and its pictures for a service provider, restricted to the authenticated user who owns the service provider.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: ID of the project to update

pictures.description: Array of picture files to upload

message.example: Not authorized to update this project

404.description: Project or service provider not found

message.example: Project or service provider not found

post.description: Creates a new service order for a service provider, placed by the authenticated user.

message.example: Service provider or skill not found

patch.description: Updates the status of a service order, restricted to the service provider.

status.description: The new status of the order

message.example: Not authorized to update this order

get.description: Retrieves a service order by its ID, accessible to the customer or service provider.

message.example: Not authorized to view this order

get.summary: Get Service Orders by User ID
get.description: Retrieves all service orders placed by a specific user.

message.example: Not authorized to view these orders

get.summary: Get Service Orders by Service Provider ID
get.description: Retrieves all service orders assigned to a specific service provider, including full user information.

message.example: Not authorized to view these orders

get.description: Retrieves a list of all service providers with their user's full name, skills, pictures, and skill domain.

post.description: Creates a new service provider for the authenticated user, assigning a domain, skills, and starting price.

description.example: Experienced web developer specializing in e-commerce solutions

skill_ids.description: Array of skill IDs to associate with the provider

description.example: Experienced web developer specializing in e-commerce solutions

post.summary: Upload Pictures for a Service Provider
post.description: Uploads a list of images for a service provider's portfolio, stores them locally, and saves their paths in the service_provider_pictures table.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the service provider to associate the pictures with

pictures.description: Array of image files to upload

message.example: Not authorized to upload pictures for this service provider

delete.description: Deletes a picture associated with a service provider's portfolio, if the authenticated user owns the service provider.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the picture to delete

message.example: Not authorized to delete this picture

get.description: Retrieves a service provider by ID with its user's full name, skills, pictures, and skill domain.

put.description: Updates an existing service provider for the authenticated user, modifying domain, skills, and starting price.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the service provider to update

description.example: Experienced web developer specializing in e-commerce solutions

skill_ids.description: Array of skill IDs to associate with the provider

description.example: Experienced web developer specializing in e-commerce solutions

message.example: You are not authorized to update this service provider

delete.description: Deletes a service provider and its associated skills and pictures for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the service provider to delete

message.example: Not authorized to delete this service provider

get.summary: Get Service Provider by User ID
get.description: Retrieves a service provider by user ID with its user's full name and picture, skills, pictures, and skill domain.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of the user associated with the service provider

get.description: Retrieves a service provider's portfolio by ID, including all projects with their pictures and service provider pictures.

get.summary: List reviews for a service provider
get.description: Retrieve all reviews for a given service provider including average and total rating stats.

post.description: Allows an authenticated user to submit a review for a service provider, excluding the owner.
Allows the owner of the service provider to reply to a specific review.

comment.example: Thank you for your kind words!

403.description: Only service provider owner can reply

422.description: Reply already exists or validation error

404.description: Service provider or review not found

delete.description: Allows a service provider owner or admin to delete a specific review.

404.description: Service provider or review not found

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of skills.
Retrieves a paginated list of skill domains.
Retrieves a supplier by its ID, including associated user, domain, and type (workshop, importer, or merchant).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the supplier to retrieve

picture.description: Image file for supplier profile (JPEG, PNG, JPG, max 2MB)

example.business_name: The business_name must be a string.

get.description: Retrieves all suppliers associated with a specific user by their user ID, including their associated domain data.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user whose suppliers are to be retrieved

404.description: No suppliers found for the user

message.example: No suppliers found for this user

get.description: Retrieves a list of all suppliers with their attributes, type (workshop, importer, or merchant), and associated domain.

type.description: Type of supplier based on subtable association (workshop, importer, merchant, or null)

picture.description: Image file for supplier profile (JPEG, PNG, JPG, max 2MB)

get.description: Retrieves all products associated with a specific supplier by their ID, including product images.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the supplier whose products are to be retrieved

get.description: Retrieve all reviews for a given supplier including average and total rating stats.

post.description: Allows an authenticated user to submit a review for a supplier, excluding the owner.
Allows the owner of the supplier to reply to a specific review.

422.description: Reply already exists or validation error

delete.description: Allows a supplier owner or admin to delete a specific review.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all Wilayas for populating a dropdown.
Retrieves a list of Communes for a specific Wilaya ID to populate a dropdown.

post.summary: Create working hours for a workspace
post.description: Creates multiple working hour entries for a given workspace. Each entry includes day, opening and closing times, and whether the workspace is open.

put.summary: Update multiple working hours by ID

404.description: Workspace or working hour not found

post.description: Creates a new studio workspace with associated details, services, and a single main picture for the authenticated user.

post.summary: Insert Images for a Studio Workspace
post.description: Uploads and associates multiple additional images with an existing studio workspace for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: ID of the studio workspace to add images to

images.description: Array of image files to upload

message.example: You are not authorized to add images to this workspace

post.description: Creates a new coworking workspace with associated details and a single main picture for the authenticated user.

post.summary: Insert Images for a Coworking Workspace
post.description: Uploads and associates multiple additional images with an existing coworking workspace for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: ID of the coworking workspace to add images to

images.description: Array of additional image files to upload

message.example: You are not authorized to add images to this workspace

get.description: Retrieves all workspaces of the specified type (studio or coworking) with their associated details, excluding images, for the authenticated user or publicly.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of workspace to retrieve (studio or coworking)

get.description: Retrieves a single workspace by its ID, including all associated details and images, for the authenticated user or publicly.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: ID of the workspace to retrieve

get.description: Retrieves all active workspaces (studio or coworking) for the currently authenticated user, including studio and coworking details (excluding services and images).

post.description: Updates an existing studio workspace, its associated details, services, and images for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: ID of the studio workspace to update

message.example: You are not authorized to update this workspace

404.description: Workspace not found or not a studio

message.example: Workspace not found or not a studio

delete.description: Deletes a studio workspace and its associated data (studio details and images) for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: ID of the studio workspace to delete

message.example: You are not authorized to delete this workspace

404.description: Workspace not found or not a studio

message.example: Workspace not found or not a studio

post.description: Updates an existing coworking workspace and its associated details for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: ID of the coworking workspace to update

message.example: You are not authorized to update this workspace

404.description: Workspace not found or not a coworking

message.example: Workspace not found or not a coworking

delete.description: Deletes a coworking workspace and its associated data (coworking details and images) for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: ID of the coworking workspace to delete

message.example: You are not authorized to delete this workspace

404.description: Workspace not found or not a coworking

message.example: Workspace not found or not a coworking

delete.description: Deletes an image associated with a studio workspace owned by the authenticated user.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: ID of the image to delete

404.description: Workspace not found or not a studio

message.example: Workspace not found or not a studio

delete.description: Deletes an image associated with a coworking workspace owned by the authenticated user.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: ID of the image to delete

message.example: You are not authorized to delete images from this workspace

get.description: Retrieve all reviews for a given workspace including average and total rating stats.

post.description: Allows an authenticated user to submit a review for a workspace, excluding the owner.
Allows the owner of the workspace to reply to a specific review.

422.description: Reply already exists or validation error

delete.description: Allows a workspace owner or admin to delete a specific review.

tags.name: Service Provider Reviews
tags.description: API Endpoints for managing service provider reviews

tags.name: Supplier Reviews
tags.description: API Endpoints for managing supplier reviews

tags.name: Workspace Reviews
tags.description: API Endpoints for managing workspace reviews
